name: Voodoo Balls
description:
Voodoo Balls is the hardest and most unique ball games around!

Have you had enough snake vs block or walls? Check out this new arcade game that will test your reflexes! It's the best ball game!

Swipe your finger and guide the over 25 balls and avoid bricks, walls, lasers and everything else! Crash into any of the bricks and you will break!

Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple swipe controls
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore
- 25 voodoo balls to unlock!
